Platforms are obstacles found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. They can always be found leading to a Magical Obelisk and cannot be failed. There are no platforms on the 4th floor.

The platforms on floors 1-3 will reward 50 Agility experience when jumped across.

The 4 consecutive platforms on the floor 2 will reward 10 Agility experience when jumped across.

The platform on floor 5 will reward 100 Agility experience when jumped across.

'''Platforms''' are obstacles found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. They can always be found leading to a [[Magical Obelisk]] and cannot be failed. There are no platforms on the 4th floor.

The platforms on floors 1-3 will reward 50 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience when jumped across.

The 4 consecutive platforms on the floor 2 will reward 10 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience when jumped across.

The platform on floor 5 will reward 100 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience when jumped across.
